entry.title: It Wears Your Face
entry.summary:
Author: amatorial

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,518Chapters: 2/6Kudos: 2

Summary: Derek was smiling—excited, rare, and real in a way Stiles hadn’t seen in years. That was all it took. He followed him into the woods, chasing that warmth like it might slip away.But something else came back with him.Now there’s something in the dark. It watches. It waits. And it feels too close, too familiar.Stiles is starting to forget where the nightmare ends and love begins.Because when what’s hunting you feels like the person you’d do anything for… how do you stop yourself from giving in?

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,183Chapters: 11/75Kudos: 19

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: Quest For Camelot
entry.summary:
Author: tabbytabbytabby

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 54,868Chapters: 11/13Kudos: 244

Summary: In a land of myth and a time of magic...  Members of the Beacon Hills pack suddenly find themselves thrust back in time with the purpose of helping Merlin stop a threat that is approaching the walls of Camelot. They have no choice but to adapt and try and fit in with this unfamiliar world. Some are more successful than others. It becomes more complicated when they discover the beast that has been terrorizing the kingdom is someone familiar. Especially when they realize that the beast might not be the real threat at all.

entry.title: Rabbit in Your Headlights
entry.summary:
Author: KatsatheGraceling

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,739Chapters: 14/17Kudos: 2,668

Summary: “Stiles?” Allison’s voice was frantic over the phone.Stiles immediately jolted upright in bed, clutching the cell close to his ear. “Allison? What’s the matter?”“Something’s wrong with Scott. I don’t—please, he’s acting—” she cut herself off.“Acting like what?” There was no answer. “Allison, like what?”“Possessed,” she whispered.  AU where Stiles was always a demon, and Scott is the one who gets possessed by the Nogitsune. Stiles is not happy about it.

entry.title: Love in time of magic
entry.summary:
Author: fromedenmylady

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,652Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 6

Summary: – I’m not doing the spell. – His tone of voice was serious and decisive.– What do you mean? You said this is the only way we can buy time! – Scott wasn’t understanding his best friend. – Malia told me about the necklaces. They will kill anything stopping them – John and Melissa were human, and the pack couldn't simply make them stop living their lives for months trying to hide.– I say a lot of things. – He tried to joke, but the audience was tough. – I only have enough juice for one last spell. – He looked at Derek now, understanding where this was going. Stiles chose him.

entry.title: Just A Human
entry.summary:
Author: FanFiction36

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,133Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 591

Summary: (A current rewriting)Stiles had always been the type that needed physical contact. Hugs, cuddles, didn't matter. Then when the pack had revealed they all scented each other and he got a taste of werewolf pack family, he was addicted. But then everyone pulled away. He was pushed from the family he had come to love.Now that he was alone, Stiles is realizing just how much danger he had gotten himself into. How was he going to heal from the loss of a pack?Then it happened like a switch after an attack. The pack was back by his side like they never left. And he felt himself try to give in to it, but Stiles doesn't forgive so easily.

entry.title: I Hated You!
entry.summary:
Author: Unknown_Hoe

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,299Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 143

Summary: Mieczyslaw Stilinkski, or as most called him Stiles, was adopted by a sheriff and his wife in Beacon Hills, and with that, most of his past vanished. That was until his mother Claudia died when he was eight, and Noah Stilinkski decided it was time to dig up the past and put it together to give it to Stiles later. Stiles uncovered this when he turned seventeen, and he was almost killed again.Stiles had been given the documents that his father had been able to put together. Learning his real name, he was shocked that his mother kept his first name, but his last name was completely foreign, and it seemed like home. Mieczyslaw Mikaelson seemed like home; of course, he still loved his father even after knowing he was his adoptive father. After taking time to swallow the pills of his past, Stiles ran to tell Scott and Derick about the new information he had learned about his life.

entry.title: A Gentleman's Liaisons
entry.summary:
Author: house_of_lantis

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,992Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 10

Summary: Peter Hale, the Duke of Beacon Hills, was content to live his life as a gentleman of leisure and an utter scoundrel, courting every pleasure available…but, he was bored. He needed a new challenge. He needed a new rival, an opponent who had the same access and skills to the playground. Chris Argent was born a gentleman who liked to get his hands dirty. But will he fall for Peter’s games or start one of his own?

entry.title: Frozen Lines
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 85,102Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 61

Summary: The ice was his sanctuary. His home.But outside the rink, everything was war.Stiles carried a past full of pain—silent wounds no one could see. And Derek, the unyielding captain of the basketball team, was the last person he wanted to face.Enemies bound by pride, secrets, and unspoken grudges.In a town where trust shatters like thin ice, their collision is inevitable.Can two broken souls break down the walls between them? Or will the fight destroy everything, including what they never expected to find: each other?The ice will always be his sanctuary. But maybe, for the first time, the battle is worth fighting off the rink.

entry.title: Fractured Reflection
entry.summary:
Author: WolfFeller

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,135Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 2

Summary: Isabelle Stilinski is kidnapped by a ghost from Peter Hale’s past. Bound, blind, and broken, she fights to survive while the pack races to save her. In a battle of rage, illusions, and shattered trust, can love pull her back from the edge?

entry.title: Blood Moon Rising
entry.summary:
Author: Mikaelsonbich25

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,336Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 99

Summary: After their fight with Donovan, Stiles left Beacon Hills to find himself again. Along the way, he was found by Kol who took him in as his 'pet'.Five years later, Scott manages to finally find his lost best friend, but when he does, he realizes Stiles had changed more than he had ever expected. Unbeknownst to Stiles, he wasn't the only one who had changed over the years.ALL OF THESE CHARACTERS ARE ADULTS!! THERE IS NO UNDERAGE RELATIONSHIPS IN THIS!!
